name: ποιέω
description:
This game was made for a class research project. It was intended to be a Unity asset pack, complete with an easy level state editor. What you see here is the final playable build. In Greek, its title means "to make". We are planning to update the game with the actual asset pack and more stuff.

Warning: You may need a REALLY beefy computer to run this at a playable frame rate.
